feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit the use of hyphens, colons, and question marks, indicating a similar punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts show a similar level of lexical variation and word choice, using technical terms and rhetorical questions.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have similar sentence structures with rhetorical questions and logical reasoning, exhibiting coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Both texts convey a similar tone of argumentation and logical reasoning, indicating a common discourse style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text, showing consistency in writing quality.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate level of confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
